[Page Title: Mellow Mushroom | Best Pizza in Charleston - West Ashley, SC | Mellow Mushroom]

Skip to main content 
Loading

Charleston - West Ashley

Charleston - West Ashley
Open at 11:00 AM | Delivery | Patio | Private Room Available 
Mellow Mushroom has the best pizza in the West Ashley area of Charleston, South Carolina. Our cinematic-themed restaurant is located in the Ashley Shoppes shopping center off Magnolia Road. Mellow is a favorite among locals from West Ashley, Avondale, Byrnes Down, James Island, Folly Beach, and the surrounding areas.

Mellow delivers the best pizza experience in town with our delicious dough, premium ingredients, and unique flavors. Delivering A Higher Order of Pizza™ is our standard. If we can make pizza this tasty and delicious, just imagine what we can do with Munchies, Greens, calzones, and burgers. Many of our pizzas can be made gluten-free or vegan.

Take your pick from our selection of 30 draft beers and our tasty, handcrafted cocktails. Looking to feed a group? Mellow has carefully curated catering options to make sure everyone goes home with their cravings satisfied.
